feed.title: Walther Timmer
feed.subtitle: Walther Timmer is a Data Engineer that loves working with the latest technologies to solve business challanges. His main strengths are being a fast learner and being able to work and deliver value on both the business- and technical-side of projects. He thrives in fast-paced work environments where he can make the difference by filling a technical gap or setting goals for the team and achieving business value.
